text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day, we learn that Narita Brian has<n>suffered
an injury. During our visit to the<n>hospital, Hishi
Amazon announces that<n>she'll be waiting for her
at the Arima<n>Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After some time, Narita Brian is<n>discharged. She
asks Hishi Amazon why<n>she's so fixated on her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon replies that something<n>about Brian
makes her want to catch up<n>to her—to overtake
her—no matter how<n>far away she gets.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian looks satisfied by the<n>response. It
turns out that she, too, has<n>someone she wants to
overtake.
